channel.title: Rogue Village is recruiting members
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Rogue Village is recruiting members"

item.title: Re: Rogue Village is recruiting members
item.content:encoded: ok still no people after posting on 5 differant forums so anyone that joins us gets a pony!

item.title: Rogue Village is recruiting members
item.content:encoded: we're fairly new and need more villages for upgrades so please come help us out. we dont require much from villagers atm and we are more than willing to help out people in need with items and whatnot. We do hope so see you!
